rows.label: qev070304_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well done, kid! If you hadn't come, I may well have
been killed tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0002
rows.name:
That Gadd punk certainly has it out for me.
Petty jealousy, no doubt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask why Professor B was being held here.

rows.label: qev070304_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you should escape before being spotted.

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah, gathering mission-critical intel!
You are ever the professional.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0004
rows.name:
You remember the two-bit kidnapper, Gadd?
Been pestering us for a while?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, he attacked while I was in the middle of
gathering materials. Had it just been his usual goons,
I would have sent them running, obviously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0006
rows.name:
But the mercenary he's hired was a different story.
I let my guard down for a second and he knocked me
out cold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0007
rows.name:
Don't you make the same mistake. Surprise attack or
no, it takes an experienced hand to take me down in
one blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0008
rows.name:
Swift and decisive action—I like it!
You're ever the consummate professional.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0009
rows.name:
Just let me say this—watch out for the mercenary
Gadd hired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0010
rows.name:
He caught me off guard, but even so, it takes an
experienced hand to knock me down in one blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0011
rows.name:
In any case, stay sharp, kid.
I'll meet you back at the Miramobile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0012
rows.name:
I never knew I was so loved. This Graham character
burst into tears of joy as soon as he saw me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0013
rows.name:
Waaaaah, Professor! Don't put me through that again!
...Seriously, pay me back immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0014
rows.name:
Haa ha ha! You sweet, clingy man. If you're really
so desperate not to let me out of your sight,
I'll allow you to work as a Factory 1.21 lackey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070304_MSG0015
rows.name:
I was just thinking we'd be needing another set of
hands around here. This should work out nicely.[ST:wait ]
